title: Shaco Changes
body:
I play alot of Shaco and find him really strong as an AP top laner (inspired by pink ward montages) and have thought of a potential buff for his W.

i propose putiing it on an ammo system similar to Teemo shrooms or Velkoz W.

it will make him so much more viable instead of waiting ages for boxes.

let me know your thoughts.

replies.body: also for crying out loud make it target shacos last target or champs
